Objects

A few examples of using object to create things.

info_outline An object has properties (written as name:value pairs) and can make use of methods. Multiple objects can have same properties with different values and can use the same methods in different orders.

Things to note:

  • object has been created with existing properties and values
  • Multiple methods are included for altering the values within the object

The object

A very basic object for some box information.

const cubeObject = {
    width:50,
    length:50,
    height:50,
    name:"Box",
    color:"black",
    changeColor: function(color){
        this['color'] = color;
    },
    changeSize: function(size){
        this['width'] = size;
        this['length'] = size;
        this['height'] = size;
    }
};
